description: My relationship with God is very important to me. I don't work now. I have degenerative joint disease mainly in my knees. I keep my license renewed in case I go on a short term mission trip. I can't hike or climb, just short walks and bicycle rides. But I can swim a lot and do other activities. I live with my daughter and her family. She has lupus. I have 4 children and 10 grandchildren. Family is important to me.
